name: beehiiv-analytics-mcp
description: MCP server for Beehiiv analytics - read-only access to publications, posts, and segments data
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that provides read-only access to Beehiiv's newsletter platform API for analytics. This extension allows you to analyze publications, posts, and segments directly from Claude Desktop. Perfect for content creators and newsletter managers who want to analyze their Beehiiv data and track performance metrics.

api_key.title: Beehiiv API Key
api_key.description: Your Beehiiv API key for authentication. You can find this in your Beehiiv dashboard under Settings > API.

tools.name: list_publications
tools.description: List all publications accessible with the API key

tools.name: get_publication_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific publication

tools.name: list_posts
tools.description: List posts from a publication with various filters (status, audience, platform, date sorting)

tools.name: get_post_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific post with optional content expansion

tools.name: get_posts_summary_stats
tools.description: Get aggregate statistics for all posts in a publication

tools.name: list_segments
tools.description: List all segments for a publication

tools.name: get_segment_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific segment
